options.name: Text - Out of 85% Safety On Left And Right
Text - Out of 90% Safety On All Sides

when: Text - Out of 85% Safety On Left And Right
Text - Out of 90% Safety On All Sides

options.name: Bug falls out of SOM / EOM
Bug within 1 min of SOM / EOM
Bugs within 1 min of each other

when: Bug falls out of SOM / EOM

Bugs within 1 min of each other

template:
{% for e in events | sort(attribute=e.location.start) %}| {{ e.location.start }} | {{ e.location.end }} | {{ e.duration }} | {{ e.message }} | {{ e.prebranded }} |
{% endfor %}

{% for e in events | sort(attribute='severity', reverse=true) %}| {{ e.location.start }} | {{ e.location.end }} | {{ e.duration }} | {{ e.name }} | {{ e.message }} | {{ e.severity }} |
{% endfor %}

{% for s in events | sort(attribute='name') %}| {{ s.name }} {{s.source.segmentIndex }} | {{ s.location.start }} | {{ s.location.end }}  | {{ s.duration }} | {{ s.message }} |
{% endfor %}

{% for s in events | sort(attribute=s.location.start) %}| {{ s.name }} | {{ s.location.start }} | {{ s.location.end }}  | {{ s.duration }} | {{ s.message }} |
{% endfor %}

{% for ac in audio_channels %}| {{ ac.number }} | {{ ac.label }} |
{% endfor %}
{{ faults(file.wooFaults, file, 'WINDOW OF OPPORTUNITY QC EVENTS') }}
